Event.Message: The VHD %1 has come online (surfaced) as disk number %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VhdDiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The VHD %1 has been removed (unsurfaced) as disk number %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VhdDiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to surface VHD %1. Error status %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to surface VHD %1. Surface attempt was cancelled.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdMetaOps" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Operation failed on VHD %2. %1 Error status %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdIoType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Vhd Chain for VHD %4 is corrupted. The expected LastWriteGUID %2 (%3) did not match the parent's actual LastWriteGUID (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ParentLastWriteGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ExpectedParentLastWriteGUID1" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="ExpectedParentLastWriteGUID2" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The change tracking file for VHD %1 is corrupted and cannot be read. No change tracking information will be available for this VHD, and change tracking will need to be enabled again before changed are tracked.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CorruptionReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The VHD file %1 has been modified without updating its associated change tracking file. Because the consistency of the change tracking information cannot be ensured, the change tracking data has been reset. No change tracking information will be available for this VHD, and change tracking will need to be enabled again before changed are tracked.

Error %1 occured when attempting to update the change tracking file for VHD %1. This will invalidate the file's change tracking information. Change tracking will not be available for this VHD until change tracking is enabled again.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Change Tracking has been enabled for the VHD %1 (%2) with log file %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VirtualDisk" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Change Tracking has been disabled for the VHD %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VirtualDisk" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Change Tracking for the VHD %1 to the log file %2 has been stopped due to the error %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VirtualDisk" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Flushing of the header of the log file %1 has failed due to error %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Flushing of the buffers to the log file %1 has failed due to error %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Opening the log file %1 for tracking has failed due to error %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Offline changes are detected for VHD %2. Log file: %1, VHD time: %4, Log file time: %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LogFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VhdFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VHDFileTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="LogFileTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>
